hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Magic Beans#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Big Poe Bottle#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Boomerang# and #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #outside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Left Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the earth is round.^Just like pizza.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Din's Fire#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Magic Beans#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals an #Octorok# guarding a rich pool.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Goron City#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #the Minuet of Forest#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Din's Fire#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Dodongo's Cavern#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Saria's Song#.
